skyux_autocomplete_multiple_results._description: Screen reader only text for multiple available results

skyux_autocomplete_no_results._description: Placeholder text for autocomplete input component when no results are found

skyux_autocomplete_one_result._description: Screen reader only text for singular available result

skyux_autocomplete_show_all._description: Menu item text to display when an unknown number of items is available to be selected

skyux_autocomplete_show_all_count._description: Menu item text to display when a known number of items is available to be selected

skyux_autocomplete_show_matches_count._description: Menu item text to display the user has searched and there are more items to view

skyux_country_field_dropdown_hint_text._description: Hint text within the country field dropdown
skyux_country_field_dropdown_hint_text.message: Type to search for a country

skyux_lookup_search_button_show_more._description: Label for lookup's search button that opens the checklist modal

skyux_lookup_show_more_add._description: Label for lookup's show more modal add button

skyux_lookup_show_more_add_button_aria_l._description: Aria-label text for the add button in the lookup show more toolbar

skyux_lookup_show_more_displayed_items_u._description: Live announcer text for when the list of selectable items changes state

skyux_lookup_show_more_select_all_button._description: Aria-label text for the select all button in the lookup show more multiselect toolbar
Text for the select all button in the lookup show more multiselect toolbar

skyux_lookup_show_more_clear_all_button_._description: Aria-label text for the select all button in the lookup show more multiselect toolbar
Text for the clear all button in the lookup show more multiselect toolbar

skyux_lookup_show_more_show_selected_opt._description: Text for the show selected checkbox in the lookup show more multiselect toolbar

skyux_lookup_show_more_cancel._description: Label for lookup's show more modal cancel button

skyux_lookup_show_more_modal_title._description: Default show more modal title using selection context

skyux_lookup_show_more_no_results._description: Placeholder text for lookup's show more modal when no results are found

skyux_lookup_show_more_select._description: Label for lookup's show more modal select (save) button

skyux_lookup_show_more_select_context._description: Label for lookup's show more modal select (save) button when context is given

skyux_lookup_tokens_summary._description: Text displayed when the user has more than the maximum items selected

skyux_search_aria_label_descriptor._description: Default aria label for a search when a descriptor is given

skyux_search_placeholder._description: Placeholder text for search input component
